text: Ne (yitsulile amacheni kano) olwakhwalakana indakano nende Abaana ba Israili- mbu mulalaama shiosi shiosi halali Nyasaye, ne mukholele Abebusi amalayi, nende abekho nende abaana abafwilwa nende abamanani, ne muboole nende abaandu obulayi, ne mulumililie okhulaama (iswala,) nende okhurusia eshihanwa (izakaa), mana nimukalukhana halali batiti mwinywe, nanyu ni mukabulilamwo oluchendo
